Blog.post: i mailed two days ago. anyone get a mix yet?!
in case anyone was wondering, it costs 83 cents to ship a cd in a slimline case in a bubble envelope first class.

let me clear up some rules for the first mix, seeing as how questions are surfacing that i would have never thought of. #1 im making a CD. if you want to make a tape thats cool (as long as its not for me. i have no tape player.) #2 number of songs is up to you. #3 there is no theme for this mix. just use it as an introduction to yourself, so when people start commenting we can learn something. #4 ALL CDS/TAPES MUST INCLUDE A TRACK LISTING. dont leave anyone hanging. thanks

addresses will go out by may 1, for the first mixtapes. DO NOT WORRY if you go to coachella, just make the mix when you get back. use the first mix as an introduction to yourself. you dont have to explain the mix, (or defend it) so its open to interpretation. anyone caught using the eminem song, "my name is" will be permanently barred from mixfriends. the management
im still accepting peeps for the next few days. we aim for may 1 as the first mix. i need your addresses! email them to me urlLink HERE .

heres the premise... make a mixtape. get a mixtape. its that simple. if you are interested in receiving a mixtape from a random person every month, exposing you to the radness of far away lands, all you gotta do is make a mixtape. then... become friends, email, date, who knows. you can meet a bunch of new peeps. heres the catch. after the first couple months, mix THEMES will appear. a subsequent website will appear for participants to post their master mixes.
When is the deadline on the mix tape anyway?

id like to welcome stefan aboard. he has no trade-bud for june so if someone FEELS STRONGLY about their hip-hop mix and wants to trade twice, STEP UP. i have all his info, so just comment and we can work something out.

how's everyone doing on the hip-hop/june mix? here's a music poll to entertain the masses: 1) name your top three favorite songs of all time 2) top three artists of all time 3) top three album COVERS of all time (since we've already done albums in general) mine: songs- 1. get up offa that thing- james brown 2. walking after you- foo fighters 3. man in the mirror- MJ artists- 1. beck 2. bjork 3. aretha franklin album covers- 1. beck- sea change 2. they might be giants- flood 3. the beatles- abbey road
Got my list. Megan, I bet you can't wait?! ;>?
Alexis- I never got the mix you were supposed to send. Unless you didn't send one. Whassup with that?
the list is out 3 DOWN! -js

comments from blogless jeremy k.: "Its my understanding that my first submission to this right-and-honourable enterprise was met with a modicrum of disdain. I can understand how someone who does not appreciate a culturally varied mix, or who needs their art spoon-fed to them would not like it. I digress." the jerm
graduation weekend. hold your horses, emails and addresses will go out monday. js

JUNE MIX.... Here's my understanding for June mix. Target send is June 1. Theme is Hip-Hop/Rap. you send to the person one below the person you sent to in may. so last time it was TWO people down. this time it's THREE people down. isn't that right, js? Just remember: June 1st. Three people down. Hip-Hop/Rap Don't steal your music. see you later guys.
so, i just noticed... is dan pierron a mixfriend drop-out? did my mix drive him away? :( yeah, when are our june mixes mailing?
Do I have this right? - The June Mix So, the June Mix is hip hop/rap. Who do we send it to? The target mailing date is June 1st, right?
mixfriend john rules! rules! rules! knowing i never received my mix, john sent me one of his own. thank you, john.

just wanted to keep you updated on some new music on the scene. upon my depart from lawrence KS, i MUST promote these two guys. not only are they killer musicians, they are nice guys as well. justin ripley (no website yet, but IM CERTAIN YOU WILL HEAR FROM THIS GUY SOON!) brett armstrong ( urlLink www.brettarmstrong.com ) download the MP3s

anyone own the re-release of brendan benson's debut cd, "one mississippi" and want to burn it for me? just wondering. sidenote. john frusciante (my personal hero and solo-artist extrordinaire, but more visible for his band red hot chili peppers) has anounced that he is going to release ONE FULL LENGTH ALBUM EVERY MONTH until next year. the first one drops june 22. what a stud. and genius.
jen- got your mix. will listen to it tonight. thx- js

Looking ahead to the June mix... I have no knowlege or exposure to hip hop (sorry Ashley). Rap and hip hop (and I don't even know if it's acceptable to lump them together) just never "grabbed" me. And, like any music, it's probably because I didn't take the time to sift through the music to find something I liked. And, I'm still open to enjoying the June mix sent to me. Consider this for June? How about making the mixes from black artists? (Am I right in assuming most hip hop artists are black?) That way it opens up the mix to much more music. If not, I'll try and get a hip hop mix together...

between mixes im going to post some musical questions, comments. feel free to pose your own, or just answer. js = = = name 7 cds in your collection that you deem as MUST HAVES... al dimeola, paco de lucia, and john mclaughlin- friday night in san francisco (live) ben kweller- sha sha brendan benson- lapulco john frusciante- to record only water for ten days jeff buckley- sketches for my sweetheart the drunk red house painters- ocean beach travis- the invisible band yo la tengo- summer sun honorable mention... red hot chili peppers- uplift mofo party plan ziggy marley- dragonfly
the new version of blogger is freaking me out

june's mix coming on like a HEART ATTACK hi. i pick HIP-HOP . now i know some of you might be scratching your heads at this point... but seeing as some of us really are music elitists- let's step outside the box. HIP HOP. and don't steal your music- if at all possible...which for some of you, i know it will not be.
i think im going to let alexis choose june's theme. i got a hot tip. shes gonna rock you with it. jason

We may be music elite-ist and I don't think that is a bad thing. I hope the person sending me the cd fills it with music he thinks is good and I've never heard it before. My mix included stuff I really enjoy. If the recipient doesn't like some of it, or all of it, it won't affect how I feel about it, but it will have offered something may be she hasn't heard before.
im thinking that i should make everyone who joins on an ADMINISTRATOR of this blog, so everyone can post. what do you think? ps- i still never got my mix (jen b.) are you still around???!!!
OK, APPARENTLY PEOPLE HAVE NOT GOTTEN MIXES. IF YOU DID NOT GET AN EMAIL WITH AN ADDRESS, COMMENT.

still no mix over here? who was supposed to send to me. get on top of that. i know a few people got mixes. anyone want to comment to me besides saying, "the mix i got sucked." ??? i think i have uncovered a tiny problem within our little system. we represent a very tiny subsect of music afficianados. almost everyone who participated in the first trade is a bit of a music elite-ist. just admit it. i think i have a damn good taste in music, but i did a lil' undercover work to find out about the girl i had to mail to and it was actually really hard to make her a mix. once we start theme time, itll throw everyone out of their element. IF YOU HAVE SUGGESTIONS FOR JUNES MIX, COMMENT AWAY! -t mgmt

last week, john frusciante released his first of 6 cds to come out in the remainder of 2004 (1 per month), "the will to death." once you get past the extremely creepy cover art, its a good listen. this disc is true john frusciante, clean, unpolished, and safe. i would have like a bit more of the guitar layering that i have grown to love from JF, but its still a good listen. if you dont own any solo JF, start with his last disc, "shadows collide with people." ( urlLink actually you can download the acoustic version from his site, search under the demos section .) +5/10

yo resident jason, i DIG YOUR MIX. i am currently blasting it from my pathfinder with the bass up and windows down. +10/10. i cant wait to get a tape from you again. ps- opening track = awesome (beth, i mailed to you today, so look for it soon.)

TO CLARIFY THE MESS, START COUNTING THE PERSON BELOW YOU AS 1 AND THEN SEND TO THE 5th PERSON. MY RECIPIENT IS NEW. MOST SHOULD BE, BUT THE LIST CHANGED SLIGHTLY, SO IF YOU ARE INDEED SENDING TO THE SAME PERSON, EMAIL ME. js3000@gmail
HOLY SHIT. stop the presses! i am resending out a better address list. look for it. sorry, i am a bad organizer. -
ADDRESSES HAVE BEEN SENT. if you did not get my email, please email me. js3000@gmail.com
Rina- I'll have your mix out asap. Sorry it's taken me so long. Not only am I lacking in the hip hop department, but things are a little insane around here. I'll try working on it tomorrow, mmkay?

JULY = COVER SONGS okay, folks. the mixtape theme for july is cover songs. all songs in your mix must have been written and previously recorded by another artist. i'm assuming the mail date will be july 1st. okay?
Megan- I think its your turn to pick the theme. Do what ya like. -The MGMT.
what's the theme for next month? july 1 is coming up...
Still didnt get a mix!!! Lauren, I sent to you like 3 weeks ago. You didnt get it? What the hell is up with no one getting a mix?!

i just want to appologize to the two people that Jeremy and I are supposed to mail to this month. We've been having some computer issues.... not to worry though... your mixes will be coming. and i'm resending to you, Lauren. Again, we're really sorry...

i know this is old hat already, but how dope is dj danger mouse's grey album. its seriously good. in fact, it may be better than both the black and white album. (ok, that may be going a little far.) comments? also check out my main dude, andrew morgan. ok, i dont really know him, but i really like his music. urlLink www.andrew-morgan.com new beasties on tuesday!
did anyone get a mix? i sent mine like 2 weeks ago. -word-

Anyone for this idea? Might I be so bold as to suggest we post our mixes and who we sent them to (and the date)? It would: a) Expose us to the music we're sharing, 2) Make sure the right person is getting the right mix, and lastly) Give the recipient and idea of when they will be receiving their mix. We post our track list as a regular post and if anyone wants to make a comment they can.

another really good album that came out recently... good news for people that love bad news by: modest mouse it's great... a little repetitive at first but just great once you get going with it. it's on iTunes for $9.99 but i'd recommend getting the album. bye.

two good albums came out in the last 2 wks. #1 the streets- a grand dont come for free ('fit but dont you know it' free download at urlLink mtv.com ) #2 the cardigans- long gone before daylight (iTunes download recommendation: you're the storm)
august's mix does not have to be sent out for AUGUST 1. dont worry. just work on it. lets aim for aug 15th . kind of a back to school thing.

OK, GET READY! augusts mix... YOUR LIFE AS TOLD BY BILLBOARD #1 SONGS here is how you make this mix. find out important dates in your life and find the songs that were #1 on the billboard charts on those dates. you dont make the mix, the mix makes you. MY LIFE TOLD BY #1s 1- the day my father was born (May 1, 1952) 2- the day my mother was born (December 2, 1954) 3- my birth (June 28, 1979) THE SONG TOPPING BILLBOAD WAS RING MY BELL! 4- my sisters birthday (October 16, 1981) 5- my brothers birthday (June 7, 1984) etc. etc. pick cool events. the first time you got laid. the first time you were arrested. your first bar fight. im sure you can get creative. use the library, it is your friend. (WE ALL COULD USE A REFRESHER IN THE LIBRARY ANYWAY.) js3K

i have some questions. 1- are you willing to do a little research for the next mix? 2- you you willing to either seek out cds, or buy a few songs from iTunes? 3- will you make a mix that is out of your hands , and has been determined by musical history? this is really important that you comment on this. i have made a mix like this before and it was totally dope. if you are in, i promise some cool outcomes.
LAST CHANCE FOR SUGGESTIONS! think hard. lets get more creative than just genre. i have some good ones, but i want you guys to pick. THINK.
new iPod released. urlLink www.apple.com

anyone want to pick augusts theme? anyone have any theme ideas? i do, but this isnt communist russia. all should speak. i have a few quick things id like to mention. + first off, ashlee simpson is STILL not a star. no matter what MTV says, i am fully aware that her show is basically a 23 minute long commercial for her whack-ass album. + second off, the john frusciante album has slowly climbed to a +8/10 in my book. i was waaay too harsh at first listen. it is really really good. + third off, thanks beth for the handwriting comment. i try. + fourth off, new Ma$e coming soon. bad boy for life. + lastly off, I HEARD A RUMOR ABOUT THE NEW iPod DESIGN! smaller, lighter, 60GB, and color perhaps? ...sorry, just got back, i had to change my boxers.
Forgot to mention...Jason has awesome handwriting.
Our first international mixfriend. Patrik you are in once you email your address. We grow, we grow, we grow. Jason

megan the pixies HAVE broken up, so it counts. use em or lose em. heres my life mix. 1 anita ward- ring my bell (bday!) 2 paul mccartney- coming up (1st bday) 3 milli vanilli- baby dont forget my number (10th bday) 4 sir mix a lot- baby got back (bar-mitzvah) 5 janet jackson- thats the way love goes (jr high graduation) 6 all 4 one- i swear (first day driving on the learners permit) 7 bryan adams- have you ever really loved a woman (js gets DL) 8 coolio- gangstas paradise (first car! 1986 ford taurus. PINK!!!! so appropriate) 9 p diddy/ma$e- cant nobody hold me down (1st place harper college art show) 10 hanson- mmmbop (PROM with christine) 11 notorious BIG- hypnotize (HS graduation) 12 notorious BIG- mo money mo problems (i go to college U of I) 13 brandy & monica- the boy is mine (cross country road trip with roubi) 14 cher- believe (first gig as infinity ball open for North Mississippi Allstars at AEPi Slush) 15 destinys child- independent women (voyage to the homeland, israel 2000) 16 crazytown- butterfly (in your face and nasty plays slush, opens for mike and joe (chumps!) 17 christina aguilera- lady marmalade (u of i graduation) 18 jennifer lopez- im real (cross country road trip with flounder and dr. rock) 19 ashanti- foolish (recorded georgia with the kid EP on cinco de mayo) 20 kelly rowland/nelly- dilemma (go to kansas for grad school) 21 50 cent- 21 questions (first kiss with ms. st louis) 22 usher- yeah (masters hooding at kansas) so thats where im at. "my life, such a bad musical mix."
rick james died. :(
addresses are out. AUGUST = BANDS THAT HAVE BROKEN UP mail sometime in the next 2 wks. thanks yall. js
did anyone see the itunes playlist in the music store: music that sells cars? too bad we didn't think of that, eh?

ok, heres what we are going to do. we will just post our playlist for our life mix on the site. you can find the number one songs urlLink HERE (thanks tina) ill be damned if i am buying any milli vanilli/50 cent/bryan adams songs from iTunes. plus after i wrote out my mix, it was god awful. so heres the NEW THEME for august. we will go with resident jasons propsed theme "BANDS THAT HAVE BROKEN UP." i will make it a little bit easier and go with bands that are no longer making music. so run with it. and post your life story playlists (including why the dates were important)! addresses to go out tomorrow

questions for y'all... 1- how many songs do you have in iTunes? 2- which artist do you have the most from? 3- what is your craziest playlist title? i also have a question to ask. i know it was my suggestion, but it is really kind of hard to find the billboard statistics, so let me know if you think we should make a different mix this month. THE BILLBOARD BOOK DOES EXIST, but ive already gone to 3 libraries and im about at the end of my rope.
